body_html:
I suspect installing macos security updates enables sip
…
On Jan 25, 2017 6:32 AM, "martin-gorner" ***@***.***> wrote: I have this issue as well. MacOS using an external GPU. DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH is set (to /usr/local/cuda/lib) /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart.8.0.dylib exists It works when I disable SIP. But something turns SIP on on a regular basis. Annoying. — You are receiving this because you commented. body_text:
I suspect installing macos security updates enables sip
…
On Jan 25, 2017 6:32 AM, "martin-gorner" ***@***.***> wrote:
 I have this issue as well.
 MacOS using an external GPU.
 DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH is set (to /usr/local/cuda/lib)
 /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart.8.0.dylib exists

 It works when I disable SIP. But something turns SIP on on a regular
 basis. Annoying.

 —
 You are receiving this because you commented.
 Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
 <#5141 (comment)>,
 or mute the thread
 <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AABaHA7am_lNemOV9kB7MS4XP-gTK9OQks5rV10RgaJpZM4Kd-hc>
 .
body:
I suspect installing macos security updates enables sip

On Jan 25, 2017 6:32 AM, "martin-gorner" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> I have this issue as well.
> MacOS using an external GPU.
> DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH is set (to /usr/local/cuda/lib)
> /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcudart.8.0.dylib exists
>
> It works when I disable SIP. But something turns SIP on on a regular
> basis. Annoying.
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you commented.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
